00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <math.h>
00020 #include <string.h>

00034 MTKt_status MtkJulianToDateTime(
00035   double jd, 
00036   char datetime[MTKd_DATETIME_LEN]  )
00037 {
00038   MTKt_status status; /* Return status */
00039   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return code of this function */
00040   int year, month, day, hour, min, sec;
00041 
00042   if (datetime == NULL)
00043     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00044 
00045   if (jd < 1721119.5)
00046     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00047 
00048   status = MtkJulianToCal(jd,&year,&month,&day,&hour,&min,&sec);
00049   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00050 
00051   sprintf(datetime,"%04d-%02d-%02dT%02d:%02d:%02dZ",year,month,day,hour,min,sec);
00052 
00053   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00054 
00055 ERROR_HANDLE:
00056   return status_code;
00057 }
